entry.title: Component Add Event Listener
entry.content:
元件監聽

<html>
<head>
  <title></title>
</head>
<body>

  Name: <input type="text" id="txtInput"/> <br>
  Hello, <span id="lblName"></span>

  <script>
    var txtInput = document.getElementById('txtInput');
    var lblName = document.getElementById('lblName');

    txtInput.addEventListener('keyup', function(){
      lblName.innerHTML = txtInput.value;
    });

  </script>
</body>
</html>
